DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to measure impedance during inpatient treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Impedance Measurements in Heart Failure Patients
DOC.criteria: patients admitted to hospital for symptoms of congestive heart failure patients older than 18 years patients willing and able to give informed consent patients who will require adrenergic or positive inotropic medications patients enrolled in a concurrent study that may confound the results of this study patients unable or unwilling to participate in study procedures patients who are pregnant patients who are mentally handicapped or legal incompetent patients who are dependent on investigator or sponsor
